cards.card_body:
### Some Quick Notes


1. Clicking on a card opens it in full screen mode, click and holding on the handle at the top lets you drag and drop to organise cards.
2. Edit mode is the pencil icon on the top right of each card, and when you want to save press CTRL+S. To cancel press ESC.
3. The card editor supports Markdown, but it's a bit janky.

card_children.subcard_body: This is a sub-card. The idea is that you will be able to add additional notes or thoughts or info pertaining to the main card as a way to flesh out the idea or add additional context.
You can add new sub-lists to help organise these cards, but right now with multiple sub-lists, adding sub-cards aren't working as expected.

cards.card_body:
### Currently Known Bugs


1. You can't edit the parent card in full screen mode right now.
2. Minimising and unminimising lists are a little unpredictable. Heroku can be slow at times so that plus maybe some convoluted logic on the backend means occasionally it doesn't work.
3. You still can't delete cards. It's on my list of todos!
